summary: Provides a CMakeToolchain class that assembles and writes CMake toolchain files for Conan packages, orchestrating discovery of the CMake executable, selection of appropriate generators, and composition of configuration sections via modular blocks. Includes a Variables helper for consistent handling of CMake variables and quoting.
business_intent: Automate the creation of reproducible, cross‑platform CMake build configurations within the Conan package manager, reducing manual setup and ensuring correct compiler, flag, and environment settings for downstream builds.
